home.headline: Software Engineer
home.subline: I'm Wishwa, a full stack software engineer building sustainable and impactful solutions by combining the precision of engineering with the creativity of design.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Hello there ! I am wishwa  and i mostly live in the web but when duty calls ready to connect my interfaces with databases using django or go. If its not web, most probably i am delivering my interfaces to every screen using flutter or building AI agents. Always ready to tackle new problems using latest technologies and deliver exceptional products.

FLY.name: Webs R Us
FLY.achievements: Led the development of a travel planning platform with 100% on-time delivery across all milestones.;Designed the applications with an offline-first approach, increasing accessibility by 30% by extending service to low-bandwidth regions of Sri Lanka, core architecture was built to be country-agnostic for broader deployment.;Overcame the challenge of enabling multi-user collaboration on shared itineraries by implementing real-time sync using Supabase Realtime.;Implemented a backend service using Gin, integrating two simulated databases to separate read and write operations, and configured automated database backups to a remote server, ensuring 100% data recovery safety in any unexpected situation.

WAD.name: We are designers
WAD.achievements: Worked closely alongside mobile and web development teams.;Designed and wrote test cases using dart and flutter for mobile and tablet applications of german social scheduling platform which currently has over 200 clients and Sri Lanka's First Buy 1 Get 1 Deals App from a well known Sri Lankan trade partnership which currently has 10,000+ downloads and average 4.4 rating in google play store.;Automated end-to-end testing across the SDLC using selenium and jest to identify issues in key workflows, cross-browser compatibility, responsiveness and accessibility in wordpress content websites and custom e-commerce systems.;Coordinated and assisted developers to evaluate and improve web performance metrics to meet industry standards using PageSpeed Insights and Chrome DevTools across all web projects.;Collaborated with team members and project stakeholders to ensure timely and accurate delivery of software products.;Automated 60% of the bug tracking and resolution workflow using Mantis Bug Tracker, streamlining issue identification, assignment, and fix verification processes.
